name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Skilled in AI and SQL with a strong emphasis on developing high-performing APIs for SaaS applications, I am an experienced Senior Backend Developer with over 10 years in crafting backend solutions tailored for financial platforms. My technical proficiency extends to **Python** (using **FastAPI**, **Django**, **Flask**) and cloud environments like **AWS** and **Azure**, ensuring scalable and efficient architectures. My background includes creating automation tools and contributing to critical projects at renowned organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska. I excel in communication, teamwork, and problem-solving, enabling me to adapt quickly in dynamic environments while delivering exceptional results.
